name: Lily tote, tree, black / pecan
description:
This generously sized tote bag is perfect for days when you need to carry many things with you for work, school or travel.
  
* Hand-silkscreen printed heavy weight cotton canvas with our original textile pattern, Tree, in black.
* The bottom portion is made from soft, 3 oz vintage finish pecan color leather.
* 8-9 oz durable brown leather strap handles.
Fully lined with natural color cotton canvas.
* 15” YKK brass metal zipper closure with leather zipper pull and Flowie logo charm.
* 2 large inner pockets.
* Bag size: 17” width X 13” height X 6” depth
* Strap drop: 9.5” 

This bag is handmade in California. Actual pattern placement on each bag may vary from photo. Each bag is unique! Since we use genuine leather, the texture of leather naturally varies from piece to piece.

Our bags are made to order. Please allow up to 7~10 business days from the date of purchase to be shipped out.

name: Lily tote, marie, red / tan
description:
This generously sized tote bag is perfect for days when you need to carry many things with you for work, school or travel.

* Hand-silkscreen printed heavy weight cotton canvas with our original textile pattern, Marie, in red.
* The bottom portion is made from 2.5 oz tan color Italian leather with a waxy surface and distressed finish (may contain a few scars, which is the charm and characteristic of this leather).
* 8-9 oz durable brown leather strap handles.
* Fully lined with natural color cotton canvas.
* 15” YKK brass metal zipper closure with leather zipper pull and Flowie logo charm.
* 2 large inner pockets.
* Bag size: 17” width X 13” height X 6” depth
* Strap drop: 9.5”

This bag is handmade in California. Actual pattern placement on each bag may vary from photo. Each bag is unique! Since we use genuine leather, the texture of leather naturally varies from piece to piece.

Our bags are made to order. Please allow up to 7~10 business days from the date of purchase to be shipped out.

name: Anna tote, tree, gray / yellow
description:
Our Anna tote is a simple flat tote. It is an elegant and stylish bag to carry your daily essentials!

* Hand-silkscreen printed heavy weight cotton canvas with our original textile pattern, Tree, in gray.
* The bottom portion is made from 3 oz yellow color cowhide leather.
* 8-9 oz durable brown leather strap handles.
* Fully lined with natural color cotton canvas.
* 2 inner patch pockets and a 7” zipper pocket.
* Magnetic button closure for easy opening.
* Bag size: 13.5” width X 15” height X 1” depth
* Strap drop: 9”

This bag is handmade in California. Actual pattern placement on each bag may vary from photo. Each bag is unique! Since we use genuine leather, the texture of leather naturally varies from piece to piece.

Our bags are made to order. Please allow up to 7~10 business days from the date of purchase to be shipped out.

name: Ella leather tote, orange
description:
Our first leather tote, Ella, is a medium size tote with a classic shape. The antique brass rivet details on the handles add unique flair to this simple leather tote.

* 3 oz soft, orange color American leather with a natural pebbled grain texture.
* 8-9 oz natural vegetable tanned leather strap handles.
* Fully lined with natural color cotton canvas.
* 2 inner leather patch pockets and a 7” zipper pocket.
* Magnetic button closure for easy opening.
* Bag size: 14.5” width X 11.5” height X 6” depth
* Strap drop: 8”

This bag is handmade in California. Since we use genuine leather, the texture of leather naturally varies from piece to piece. Each bag is unique!

Our bags are made to order. Please allow up to 7~10 business days from the date of purchase to be shipped out.

name: Mini tote, tree, black
description:
This mighty mini tote is your best companion to run a quick errand—when you only need your wallet, keys and cell phone. It is also an ideal lunch bag!

* Fully lined with natural color cotton canvas.
* Snap button closure.

* The bottom portion is made from 3 oz vintage finish pecan color leather.
* 8-9 oz durable brown leather strap handles.
* Fully lined with natural color cotton canvas.
* 2 inner patch pockets and a 7” zipper pocket.
* Magnetic button closure for easy opening.
* Bag size: 13.5” width X 15” height X 1” depth
* Strap drop: 9”

This bag is handmade in California. Actual pattern placement on each bag may vary from photo. Each bag is unique! Since we use genuine leather, the texture of leather naturally varies from piece to piece.

Our bags are made to order. Please allow up to 7~10 business days from the date of purchase to be shipped out.

Each towel is hand screen printed with water-based ink and hand sewn in our studio.

name: Leather Clutch, gold/minty blue
description:
Introduce Flowie's first leather clutch design!  It is a simple yet stylish clutch that you can dress up or dress down with, as an evening clutch or a fancy makeup bag.

* Minty blue lambskin on one side and gold foil lambskin on the other side.
* Lined with Flowie's "Square" cotton fabric in black.
* Gold brass zipper closure
* Handmade in CA, USA 
* Since we use genuine leather, the texture of leather naturally varies from piece to piece.

Size:	approx. 11" W X 11" H (unfold size)
Material: genuine lambskin leather
Lining: 100% cotton

Our bags are made to order. Please allow up to 7~10 business days from the date of purchase to be shipped out.
